title: CarTrade Technologies open to further acquisitions to fast-track expansion plans
description: The integration with OLX, CEO Vinay Sanghi said, has also helped more than double the average number of unique visitors to 68 million per month, with 90% of these coming in organically. While auto still continues to comprise 80% of revenues at the Group, Sanghi said the focus will also be on expanding non-auto business verticals going ahead.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
